display_long_description:
Exercise the mind, body & soul in this fast-paced feast of micro challenges, high intensity boss battles and a concoction of collectibles that unravel as you jog across vibrant backdrops of color and joy.

# RUN FOR YOUR LIFE
Get physical with lifelike jog-in-place controls or stick with the less intensive arm-swing mode as you run for your life through the bright and stylish world of madness.

[media]


# MINIGAME MADNESS

Match, Catch, Pop, Chop, Hack, Slash and Bash your way through quick-thinking showdowns that block your path forward to each castle lair!                                

[media]


# HURRY, HURRY, HURRY
It’s a race against time as every passing second drains from the longevity of your beating heart.

[media]


# MASTER THEM ALL
Master all hazard and showdown challenges with the help of collectible character cards found throughout the world. Learn their weakness and let ‘em have it!

[media]


# SUBSTANCE AND STYLE
Unlock hands and tombstones to make a statement during your run, and even after death.

[media]


# LEVEL UP
Spend the RO (Royal Offspring) that you’ve saved from each castle lair on valuable upgrades to increase your sword, shield or heart duration.

[media]

# MINIGAME MADNESS

Match, Catch, Pop, Chop, Hack, Slash and Bash your way through quick-thinking showdowns that block your path forward to each castle lair!                                

![{"height":1080,"type":"image","width":1920}](https://scontent-fra3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/86659801_2932247743583077_7417664589811237837_n.png?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=bLjoOyX3-sYQ7kNvwG6Fqmf&_nc_oc=Adl2YWxsdWgm8iL_MchIz_4QrZ7GvrnU46Hr9s5pk3zc5z1MSaHn4jHLnPuWM-d9h5Y&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfpkWWeaNrS1jrCm_41N6bBmndIiI0UW7GU8d1E06OVgnA&oe=697C5F6A)


# HURRY, HURRY, HURRY
It’s a race against time as every passing second drains from the longevity of your beating heart.

![{"height":984,"type":"image","width":1748}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507165_447221264980420_8367178254206728213_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=YD9eMMiWywwQ7kNvwFlYbri&_nc_oc=AdnxJKg-lUMRgqK60it9cHv1Zn8QOEgZA9wj5z4NdVhmVPHo6i_8i9ppKmaJ6McnqwE&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_Afqdhe8pIOsQUnWAwDeuEwXkTvw_Kb36h9s-Z5zioeIMGw&oe=697C8812)


# MASTER THEM ALL
Master all hazard and showdown challenges with the help of collectible character cards found throughout the world. Learn their weakness and let ‘em have it!

![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/57570293_4078635569072597_4548948488473550523_n.png?_nc_cat=107&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=bEmkpGLeeL4Q7kNvwHU4EHe&_nc_oc=AdmwnqsweIg12Bt23dPkGLSsdUSzEmkosrVeZ2VKyWJpUXT3oUmscfjXqayeji0AqYg&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfqWj-oHKJ2nYDtSE6MKTSh1dT3zPkrl0NzMxBKH7Nvm7A&oe=697C8EED)


# SUBSTANCE AND STYLE
Unlock hands and tombstones to make a statement during your run, and even after death.

![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982723_2208705096178691_3774754884521119372_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=HEuNAxGAaHoQ7kNvwH4GaI5&_nc_oc=Adl30AqA8jXbVsccGCVCxQtNtL9dsWgnAYWVVXoIXzREIWiwAcOelRxUUYiGRiLXxx4&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfqhYfwhcsF21OEevhk3ZqVw8nRSIX0gyjExmyZm36PJiA&oe=697C6B10)


# LEVEL UP
Spend the RO (Royal Offspring) that you’ve saved from each castle lair on valuable upgrades to increase your sword, shield or heart duration.
